name: Monster Face
description:
A small casual game, easy to pick up and put down. Choose one of 4 game modes, then throw nums into the mouth of a randomly generated monster. All modes are challenging, but Zen Mode is playable even by toddlers. How quickly do you give up, and can you beat your last high score?

Monster Face has been updated to version 2.1. Lots of big changes, including a new interface look and all new animations for all faces. Enjoy!

Version 2.6 is out. A new monster, named Boo has joined the cast. Loading is now faster and better, and you can choose to keep a face when restarting a game.

Presenting Version 3.1 to celebrate parallel release to Google Play. Each monster now has it's own unique music, and missing a throw results in a mode-specific sound. In addition to clicking, you can now also throw nums using space bar
